messages.message: Customer wants to be able to upload a file to Instabase using a signed URL from Google Cloud Storage. cc: @Heymian @hannah - added you both to the email. Copying here for visibility.
why is the signed URL important to their use case?
They have files in Google Cloud Storage and they want to use them in AI Hub without downloading the data, and the uploading it again

Added this to new feature request backlog https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1068

We're quite a bit far from supporting this, but in future, we might be able to do this as an extension of the batch work
@Heymian added to JIRA just for reference, this is a won't do for now

BTW, this is likely not just getting a file from a signed URL, but getting a file directly from any URL that is either unauth or signed. Still think it's a won't do for the moment, but could be a good upload pattern to consider as we build URL support especially
Agreed, this is something worth considering as future work since it would make uploads easier.
